actions.description: Your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d10 + PB force damage
actions.name: Force-Empowered Slam

languages: understands the languages its owner speaks
name: Dancing Item [TCE]

specialTraits.description: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form
specialTraits.name: Immutable Form

specialTraits.description: When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the item, the item can increase or decrease (your choice) the walking speed of that creature by 10 feet until the end of the turn, provided the item isn't incapacitated
specialTraits.name: Irrepressible Dance
